definition: thoroughfare/to go straight ahead/to rush/to clash
point of a spear/edge of a tool/vanguard/forward (in sports team)
gun/firearm/rifle/spear/thing with shape or function similar to a gun/CL:支[zhi1],把[ba3],桿|杆[gan3],條|条[tiao2],枝[zhi1]/to substitute for another person in a test/to knock/classifier for rifle shots

sentences.english: No REAL cop would have an Uzi that size.
sentences.chinese: 沒有任何一個真警察會用那種大小的衝鋒槍。

sentences.english: They wear ski masks and carry pistols and machine guns.
sentences.chinese: 他們戴着滑雪面具，攜帶手槍和衝鋒槍。

sentences.english: Other officers and submachine gunners were asked to wait outside until we come back.
sentences.chinese: 其他軍官和衝鋒槍手被要求留在外邊等我們出來。

sentences.english: Random Submachine Gun, Shotgun, and Pistol at beginning of round.
sentences.chinese: 隨機槍械組合，包含衝鋒槍，散彈槍和手槍。

sentences.english: An interesting question is the ancestry of the design of Uzi submachinegun .
sentences.chinese: 一個有趣的問題是對烏茲衝鋒槍的設計血統。

sentences.english: You asked me what type of SMG we used in our company.
sentences.chinese: 你問我在連隊裏我們用什麼型號的衝鋒槍。

sentences.english: Jack was given a solid-projectile submachinegun that fired explosive pellets.
sentences.chinese: 傑克配備了一支發射可爆彈丸的霰彈衝鋒槍。

sentences.english: Kalashnikov has just been acquired by London's Design Museum.
sentences.chinese: 倫敦設計博物館剛剛獲得一個卡拉什尼科夫衝鋒槍。

sentences.english: The rest were in trenches with light MG and SMGs.
sentences.chinese: 其餘的人都在戰壕裏用輕機槍和衝鋒槍射擊。

sentences.english: The conventional submachinegun will be substituted for by the small caliber assault rifle.
sentences.chinese: 常規衝鋒槍將被小口徑突擊步槍所取代。

sentences.english: It was envisioned as a possible replacement for the STEN submachinegun then in service.
sentences.chinese: 這是設想作爲司登衝鋒槍可能接替然後在服務。

sentences.english: At this time, the Wuchang holding a submachinegun seized from the devil body joined the battle.
sentences.chinese: 此時，那五常抱着從鬼子身上繳獲的衝鋒槍加入戰鬥。

sentences.english: Ideally they would have carried a short submachine gun, suitable for use in confined spaces.
sentences.chinese: 最好是，他們攜帶有適用於封閉空間的短衝鋒槍。

sentences.english: The gunman has been described as a white man armed with a submachinegun.
sentences.chinese: 據稱，持槍者是一名攜帶衝鋒槍的白人男子。

definition: without a retreat route/caught in a dead end/having burned one's bridges
alarm (e.g. burglar or fire alarm)/warning device
